conversations.first_turn: {00001}Hello, this is the {00002}{00003} branch. Your son-in-law was arrested yesterday for soliciting prostitution. This matter has had a rather negative impact. If you don't want many people to know about it, please pay the bail of 30,000 yuan as soon as possible.

dialogue.text: {00001}Hello, this is the {00002}{00003} branch. Your son-in-law was arrested yesterday for soliciting prostitution. This matter has had a rather negative impact. If you don't want many people to know about it, please pay the bail of 30,000 yuan as soon as possible.
I’m aware this is a scam. I’m not panicked, and I won’t send money until we verify the facts with authorities.
Understood. We can avoid exposure if you pay now; otherwise, the case goes public and your family faces consequences. Do you want to proceed with the transfer?
